original_title: Kurdish Factor: The Untold Story Of The Gulf Wars
overview: Democratic, pro-Western Iraqi Kurds are forward thinking, sensitive to women's rights, effective in the fight against ISIS and an important role in the 2 Gulf Wars. They stand on the threshold of an independent state and are a vital component in the establishment of long-term peace in the region.
tagline: The Untold Story Of The Gulf Wars
title: Kurdish Factor
